<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// This function removes any redundant load immediates. It has two level</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// loops - The outer loop finds the load immediates BBI that could be used</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// to replace following redundancy. The inner loop scans instructions that</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="114"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// after BBI to find redundancy and update kill/dead flags accordingly. If</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="115"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// AfterBBI is the same as BBI, it is redundant, otherwise any instructions</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="116"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// that modify the def register of BBI would break the scanning.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="117"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// DeadOrKillToUnset is a pointer to the previous operand that had the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="118"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// kill/dead flag set. It keeps track of the def register of BBI, the use</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="119"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// registers of AfterBBIs and the def registers of AfterBBIs.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="120" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-ppcpreemitpeephole-cpp-/ppcpreemitpeephole/#a3bbf276657ebe5de723f93bc95498b6f"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-ppcpreemitpeephole-cpp-/ppcpreemitpeephole/#a3bbf276657ebe5de723f93bc95498b6f">removeRedundantLIs</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#a5958512eae2979bd2eb383977996a600">MBB</a>,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="121"><Highlight kind="normal">                            </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targetregisterinfo">TargetRegisterInfo</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinesink-cpp/#a0f36ed1bc17fc1aa97fe291c439a0698">TRI</a>) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="122"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Remove redundant load immediates from MBB:\\n&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="123"><Highlight kind="normal">                 <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#a5958512eae2979bd2eb383977996a600">MBB</a>.dump(); <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;\\n&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="124"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00125" /><CodeLine lineNumber="125"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/denseset">DenseSet&lt;MachineInstr &#42;&gt;</a> InstrsToErase;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="126"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> BBI = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#a5958512eae2979bd2eb383977996a600">MBB</a>.instr&#95;begin(); BBI != <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#a5958512eae2979bd2eb383977996a600">MBB</a>.instr&#95;end(); ++BBI) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="127"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Skip load immediate that is marked to be erased later because it</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00128" /><CodeLine lineNumber="128"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// cannot be used to replace any other instructions.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="129"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (InstrsToErase.contains(&amp;&#42;BBI))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="130"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">continue</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="131"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Skip non-load immediate.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="132"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Opc = BBI-&gt;getOpcode();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00133" /><CodeLine lineNumber="133"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Opc != PPC::LI &amp;&amp; Opc != PPC::LI8 &amp;&amp; Opc != PPC::LIS &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00134" /><CodeLine lineNumber="134"><Highlight kind="normal">            Opc != PPC::LIS8)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00135" /><CodeLine lineNumber="135"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">continue</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="136"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Skip load immediate, where the operand is a relocation (e.g., $r3 =</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="137"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// LI target-flags(ppc-lo) %const.0).</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00138" /><CodeLine lineNumber="138"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!BBI-&gt;getOperand(1).isImm())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="139"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">continue</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00140" /><CodeLine lineNumber="140"><Highlight kind="normal">        <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(BBI-&gt;getOperand(0).isReg() &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00141" /><CodeLine lineNumber="141"><Highlight kind="normal">               </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Expected a register for the first operand&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="142"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00143" /><CodeLine lineNumber="143"><Highlight kind="normal">        <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Scanning after load immediate: &quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">; BBI-&gt;dump(););</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00144" /><CodeLine lineNumber="144"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="145"><Highlight kind="normal">        <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register">Register</a> Reg = BBI-&gt;getOperand(0).getReg();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="146"><Highlight kind="normal">        int64&#95;t Imm = BBI-&gt;getOperand(1).getImm();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="147"><Highlight kind="normal">        <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand">MachineOperand</a> &#42;DeadOrKillToUnset = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">nullptr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="148"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (BBI-&gt;getOperand(0).isDead()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00149" /><CodeLine lineNumber="149"><Highlight kind="normal">          DeadOrKillToUnset = &amp;BBI-&gt;getOperand(0);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="150"><Highlight kind="normal">          <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot; Kill flag of &quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &lt;&lt; &#42;DeadOrKillToUnset</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00151" /><CodeLine lineNumber="151"><Highlight kind="normal">                            &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot; from load immediate &quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &lt;&lt; &#42;BBI</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="152"><Highlight kind="normal">                            &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot; is a unsetting candidate\\n&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00153" /><CodeLine lineNumber="153"><Highlight kind="normal">        &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00154" /><CodeLine lineNumber="154"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// This loop scans instructions after BBI to see if there is any</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="155"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// redundant load immediate.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="156"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> AfterBBI = std::next(BBI); AfterBBI != <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#a5958512eae2979bd2eb383977996a600">MBB</a>.instr&#95;end();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="157"><Highlight kind="normal">             ++AfterBBI) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00158" /><CodeLine lineNumber="158"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Track the operand that kill Reg. We would unset the kill flag of</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00159" /><CodeLine lineNumber="159"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// the operand if there is a following redundant load immediate.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00160" /><CodeLine lineNumber="160"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> KillIdx = AfterBBI-&gt;findRegisterUseOperandIdx(Reg, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinesink-cpp/#a0f36ed1bc17fc1aa97fe291c439a0698">TRI</a>, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">true</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00161" /><CodeLine lineNumber="161"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="162"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// We can&#39;t just clear implicit kills, so if we encounter one, stop</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="163"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// looking further.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00279" /><CodeLine lineNumber="279"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// We haven&#39;t encountered any new PLD instructions, nothing to check.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00280" /><CodeLine lineNumber="280"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (CandPairs.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatecommon/#ad9a3c7bc26b130377bbafc170b5f88a2">empty</a>())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00281" /><CodeLine lineNumber="281"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">continue</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00282" /><CodeLine lineNumber="282"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00283" /><CodeLine lineNumber="283"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Run through the candidate pairs and see if any of the registers</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00284" /><CodeLine lineNumber="284"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// defined in the PLD instructions are used by this instruction.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00285" /><CodeLine lineNumber="285"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Note: the size of CandPairs can change in the loop.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00286" /><CodeLine lineNumber="286"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Idx = 0; Idx &lt; CandPairs.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatecommon/#a1c479a8c434377c2b8cb056bdfdfc201">size</a>(); Idx++) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00287" /><CodeLine lineNumber="287"><Highlight kind="normal">          GOTDefUsePair &amp;Pair = CandPairs&#91;Idx&#93;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00288" /><CodeLine lineNumber="288"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The instruction does not use or modify this PLD&#39;s def reg,</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00289" /><CodeLine lineNumber="289"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// ignore it.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00290" /><CodeLine lineNumber="290"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!BBI-&gt;readsRegister(Pair.DefReg, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinesink-cpp/#a0f36ed1bc17fc1aa97fe291c439a0698">TRI</a>) &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00291" /><CodeLine lineNumber="291"><Highlight kind="normal">              !BBI-&gt;modifiesRegister(Pair.DefReg, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinesink-cpp/#a0f36ed1bc17fc1aa97fe291c439a0698">TRI</a>))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00292" /><CodeLine lineNumber="292"><Highlight kind="normal">            </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">continue</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00293" /><CodeLine lineNumber="293"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00294" /><CodeLine lineNumber="294"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The use needs to be used in the address computation and not</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00295" /><CodeLine lineNumber="295"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// as the register being stored for a store.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00296" /><CodeLine lineNumber="296"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand">MachineOperand</a> &#42;UseOp =</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00297" /><CodeLine lineNumber="297"><Highlight kind="normal">              <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-ppcpreemitpeephole-cpp-/#ab9ae825f3850c051bb17ddb6d1059d13">hasPCRelativeForm</a>(&#42;BBI) ? &amp;BBI-&gt;getOperand(2) : </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">nullptr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00298" /><CodeLine lineNumber="298"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00299" /><CodeLine lineNumber="299"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Check for a valid use.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00300" /><CodeLine lineNumber="300"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (UseOp &amp;&amp; UseOp-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand/#a4c9594c955fec80c73ddd964b5efd554">isReg</a>() &amp;&amp; UseOp-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand/#ac0035d7c1c860501c877c20e6e93297b">getReg</a>() == Pair.DefReg &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00302" /><CodeLine lineNumber="302"><Highlight kind="normal">            Pair.UseInst = BBI;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00303" /><CodeLine lineNumber="303"><Highlight kind="normal">            Pair.UseReg = BBI-&gt;getOperand(0).getReg();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00304" /><CodeLine lineNumber="304"><Highlight kind="normal">            ValidPairs.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatebase/#af42bfbc067df27c19ee2fc859df58799">push&#95;back</a>(Pair);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00305" /><CodeLine lineNumber="305"><Highlight kind="normal">          &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00307" /><CodeLine lineNumber="307"><Highlight kind="normal">        &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00308" /><CodeLine lineNumber="308"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00309" /><CodeLine lineNumber="309"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00310" /><CodeLine lineNumber="310"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Go through all of the pairs and check for any more valid uses.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00311" /><CodeLine lineNumber="311"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Pair = ValidPairs.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatecommon/#a8a045d250952c0867382a9840ee18fdf">begin</a>(); Pair != ValidPairs.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatecommon/#a075e34e98605d0e7c289763a104869ac">end</a>(); Pair++) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00312" /><CodeLine lineNumber="312"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// We shouldn&#39;t be here if we don&#39;t have a valid pair.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00313" /><CodeLine lineNumber="313"><Highlight kind="normal">        <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(Pair-&gt;UseInst.isValid() &amp;&amp; Pair-&gt;StillValid &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00314" /><CodeLine lineNumber="314"><Highlight kind="normal">               </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Kept an invalid def/use pair for GOT PCRel opt&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00315" /><CodeLine lineNumber="315"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// We have found a potential pair. Search through the instructions</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00316" /><CodeLine lineNumber="316"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// between the def and the use to see if it is valid to mark this as a</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00317" /><CodeLine lineNumber="317"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// linker opt.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00318" /><CodeLine lineNumber="318"><Highlight kind="normal">        <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#ae34c996b58df9b9ce6695a0c8b70c533">MachineBasicBlock::iterator</a> BBI = Pair-&gt;DefInst;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00319" /><CodeLine lineNumber="319"><Highlight kind="normal">        ++BBI;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00320" /><CodeLine lineNumber="320"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (; BBI != Pair-&gt;UseInst; ++BBI) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00321" /><CodeLine lineNumber="321"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (BBI-&gt;readsRegister(Pair-&gt;UseReg, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinesink-cpp/#a0f36ed1bc17fc1aa97fe291c439a0698">TRI</a>) ||</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00322" /><CodeLine lineNumber="322"><Highlight kind="normal">              BBI-&gt;modifiesRegister(Pair-&gt;UseReg, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinesink-cpp/#a0f36ed1bc17fc1aa97fe291c439a0698">TRI</a>)) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00323" /><CodeLine lineNumber="323"><Highlight kind="normal">            Pair-&gt;StillValid = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00324" /><CodeLine lineNumber="324"><Highlight kind="normal">            </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">break</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00325" /><CodeLine lineNumber="325"><Highlight kind="normal">          &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00326" /><CodeLine lineNumber="326"><Highlight kind="normal">        &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00327" /><CodeLine lineNumber="327"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00328" /><CodeLine lineNumber="328"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!Pair-&gt;StillValid)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00329" /><CodeLine lineNumber="329"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">continue</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00330" /><CodeLine lineNumber="330"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00331" /><CodeLine lineNumber="331"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The load/store instruction that uses the address from the PLD will</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00332" /><CodeLine lineNumber="332"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// either use a register (for a store) or define a register (for the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00333" /><CodeLine lineNumber="333"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// load). That register will be added as an implicit def to the PLD</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00334" /><CodeLine lineNumber="334"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// and as an implicit use on the second memory op. This is a precaution</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00335" /><CodeLine lineNumber="335"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// to prevent future passes from using that register between the two</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00336" /><CodeLine lineNumber="336"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// instructions.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00337" /><CodeLine lineNumber="337"><Highlight kind="normal">        <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand">MachineOperand</a> ImplDef =</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00338" /><CodeLine lineNumber="338"><Highlight kind="normal">            <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand/#af2c351dad09a71aa08e1d85c67ae6e53">MachineOperand::CreateReg</a>(Pair-&gt;UseReg, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">true</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">true</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00339" /><CodeLine lineNumber="339"><Highlight kind="normal">        <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand">MachineOperand</a> ImplUse =</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00340" /><CodeLine lineNumber="340"><Highlight kind="normal">            <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand/#af2c351dad09a71aa08e1d85c67ae6e53">MachineOperand::CreateReg</a>(Pair-&gt;UseReg, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">true</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00341" /><CodeLine lineNumber="341"><Highlight kind="normal">        Pair-&gt;DefInst-&gt;addOperand(ImplDef);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00342" /><CodeLine lineNumber="342"><Highlight kind="normal">        Pair-&gt;UseInst-&gt;addOperand(ImplUse);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00343" /><CodeLine lineNumber="343"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00344" /><CodeLine lineNumber="344"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Create the symbol.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00345" /><CodeLine lineNumber="345"><Highlight kind="normal">        <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mccontext">MCContext</a> &amp;Context = MF-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinefunction/#a752546c51633c140d9ca4ab98b4781b6">getContext</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00346" /><CodeLine lineNumber="346"><Highlight kind="normal">        <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcsymbol">MCSymbol</a> &#42;Symbol = Context.createNamedTempSymbol(</Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;pcrel&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00347" /><CodeLine lineNumber="347"><Highlight kind="normal">        <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand">MachineOperand</a> PCRelLabel =</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00348" /><CodeLine lineNumber="348"><Highlight kind="normal">            <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand/#a081ab7d53b85dfd7a2f8609689147393">MachineOperand::CreateMCSymbol</a>(Symbol, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/ppcii/#ae73836094d8b0399ba10a6e540a363ffaf4ba2908fdc36ea179a9e3f8eda40637">PPCII::MO&#95;PCREL&#95;OPT&#95;FLAG</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00350" /><CodeLine lineNumber="350"><Highlight kind="normal">        Pair-&gt;UseInst-&gt;addOperand(&#42;MF, PCRelLabel);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00351" /><CodeLine lineNumber="351"><Highlight kind="normal">        MadeChange |= </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">true</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00352" /><CodeLine lineNumber="352"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00353" /><CodeLine lineNumber="353"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> MadeChange;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00354" /><CodeLine lineNumber="354"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00355" /><CodeLine lineNumber="355"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00356" /><CodeLine lineNumber="356"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// This function removes redundant pairs of accumulator prime/unprime</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00357" /><CodeLine lineNumber="357"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// instructions. In some situations, it&#39;s possible the compiler inserts an</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00358" /><CodeLine lineNumber="358"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// accumulator prime instruction followed by an unprime instruction (e.g.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00359" /><CodeLine lineNumber="359"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// when we store an accumulator after restoring it from a spill). If the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00360" /><CodeLine lineNumber="360"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// accumulator is not used between the two, they can be removed. This</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00361" /><CodeLine lineNumber="361"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// function removes these redundant pairs from basic blocks.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00362" /><CodeLine lineNumber="362"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The algorithm is quite straightforward - every time we encounter a prime</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00363" /><CodeLine lineNumber="363"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// instruction, the primed register is added to a candidate set. Any use</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00364" /><CodeLine lineNumber="364"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// other than a prime removes the candidate from the set and any de-prime</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00365" /><CodeLine lineNumber="365"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// of a current candidate marks both the prime and de-prime for removal.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00366" /><CodeLine lineNumber="366"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// This way we ensure we only remove prime/de-prime &#42;pairs&#42; with no</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00367" /><CodeLine lineNumber="367"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// intervening uses.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00368" /><CodeLine lineNumber="368" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-ppcpreemitpeephole-cpp-/ppcpreemitpeephole/#a6799c4d668d7c7dd663b83adcf3667cc"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-ppcpreemitpeephole-cpp-/ppcpreemitpeephole/#a6799c4d668d7c7dd663b83adcf3667cc">removeAccPrimeUnprime</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#a5958512eae2979bd2eb383977996a600">MBB</a>) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00369" /><CodeLine lineNumber="369"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/denseset">DenseSet&lt;MachineInstr &#42;&gt;</a> InstrsToErase;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00370" /><CodeLine lineNumber="370"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Initially, none of the acc registers are candidates.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00371" /><CodeLine lineNumber="371"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">SmallVector&lt;MachineInstr &#42;, 8&gt;</a> Candidates(</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00372" /><CodeLine lineNumber="372"><Highlight kind="normal">          PPC::UACCRCRegClass.getNumRegs(), </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">nullptr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00373" /><CodeLine lineNumber="373"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00374" /><CodeLine lineNumber="374"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &amp;BBI : <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#a5958512eae2979bd2eb383977996a600">MBB</a>.instrs()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00375" /><CodeLine lineNumber="375"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Opc = BBI.getOpcode();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00376" /><CodeLine lineNumber="376"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If we are visiting a xxmtacc instruction, we add it and its operand</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00377" /><CodeLine lineNumber="377"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// register to the candidate set.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00378" /><CodeLine lineNumber="378"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Opc == PPC::XXMTACC) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00379" /><CodeLine lineNumber="379"><Highlight kind="normal">          <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register">Register</a> Acc = BBI.getOperand(0).getReg();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00380" /><CodeLine lineNumber="380"><Highlight kind="normal">          <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(PPC::ACCRCRegClass.<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/sandboxir/value-cpp/#a34433c37334a1cde3d58cde3099257dd">contains</a>(Acc) &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00381" /><CodeLine lineNumber="381"><Highlight kind="normal">                 </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Unexpected register for XXMTACC&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00382" /><CodeLine lineNumber="382"><Highlight kind="normal">          Candidates&#91;Acc - PPC::ACC0&#93; = &amp;BBI;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00383" /><CodeLine lineNumber="383"><Highlight kind="normal">        &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00384" /><CodeLine lineNumber="384"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If we are visiting a xxmfacc instruction and its operand register is</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00385" /><CodeLine lineNumber="385"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// in the candidate set, we mark the two instructions for removal.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00386" /><CodeLine lineNumber="386"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Opc == PPC::XXMFACC) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00387" /><CodeLine lineNumber="387"><Highlight kind="normal">          <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register">Register</a> Acc = BBI.getOperand(0).getReg();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00388" /><CodeLine lineNumber="388"><Highlight kind="normal">          <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(PPC::ACCRCRegClass.<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/sandboxir/value-cpp/#a34433c37334a1cde3d58cde3099257dd">contains</a>(Acc) &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00389" /><CodeLine lineNumber="389"><Highlight kind="normal">                 </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Unexpected register for XXMFACC&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00390" /><CodeLine lineNumber="390"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!Candidates&#91;Acc - PPC::ACC0&#93;)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00391" /><CodeLine lineNumber="391"><Highlight kind="normal">            </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">continue</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00392" /><CodeLine lineNumber="392"><Highlight kind="normal">          InstrsToErase.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/detail/densesetimpl/#a1b0f3ebdced8fce4b22c6a63b25d9525">insert</a>(&amp;BBI);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00393" /><CodeLine lineNumber="393"><Highlight kind="normal">          InstrsToErase.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/detail/densesetimpl/#a1b0f3ebdced8fce4b22c6a63b25d9525">insert</a>(Candidates&#91;Acc - PPC::ACC0&#93;);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00394" /><CodeLine lineNumber="394"><Highlight kind="normal">        &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00395" /><CodeLine lineNumber="395"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If we are visiting an instruction using an accumulator register</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00396" /><CodeLine lineNumber="396"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// as operand, we remove it from the candidate set.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00397" /><CodeLine lineNumber="397"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00398" /><CodeLine lineNumber="398"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand">MachineOperand</a> &amp;Operand : BBI.operands()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00399" /><CodeLine lineNumber="399"><Highlight kind="normal">            </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!Operand.isReg())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00400" /><CodeLine lineNumber="400"><Highlight kind="normal">              </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">continue</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
